title: Aucuparia
intro: I lead the front-end for Aucuparia, a park and green-space consultancy
text: I worked with the team at SpectraKey to create a portfolio website for Aucuparia Consultancy. The customer needed to be able to iterate over the content quickly, adding projects and experiences on the fly. We opted for a CMS using Python and Django, chosen for it’s simple admin panel and authorization system. This was fronted with Django’s REST api framework, allowing us to separate the concerns of the project. The REST api is consumed on the front-end using AngularJS.
